Month: Note:Industrial enterprises above designated size are all state-owned enterprises and non-state owned enterprises with annual revenue from principal business over 5 million yuan from 1998 to 2006, and are industrial enterprise with annual revenue from principal business over 5 million yuan from 2007 to 2010. Approved by the State Council in 2011, Industrial enterprises above designated size are enterprise with annual revenue from principal business over 20 million yuan.
